bug.author: varisd
bug.summary: learning_utils.join_exection_results does not support OutputSeries == dict
bug.description:
Inline method join in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ufal/neuralmonkey/blob/master/neuralmonkey/learning_utils.py#L404>https://github.com/ufal/neuralmonkey/blob/master/neuralmonkey/learning_utils.py#L404</denchmark-link>
has undefined behaviour when processing a List of dictionary-like output series. This behavior was supported before the runners refactor and is not backwards compatible.
